This 3-room apartment, 46.4mÂ², has undergone a complete renovation. It faces southeast. Ideal for a couple, single person, family with children, or as an investment property. The apartment is located on the first floor of an 11-story building in the quiet and leafy "Podgrodzie" housing estate at 10 Krasnobrodzka Street in Warsaw. The apartment has undergone a complete renovation and has had its plumbing, sewage, and electrical systems replaced â€“ you'll be the first to use it! It features new flooring, new plaster on the walls and ceilings, new interior doors, and attractive, conglomerate window sills. The apartment is ready for immediate occupancy! the area of 46.4 m2 consists of: living room with kitchenette (22.0 m2) with access to the balcony bedroom (10.5 m2) room (6.3 m2) to be used as needed: for a children's room, office, remote work space bathroom with large shower (3.0 m2) hall with space for spacious wardrobes (4.6 m2) In addition, the apartment includes a basement (2.4 m2). Infrastructure and surroundings: The building is monitored, accessible to people with disabilities, and has two modern elevators. The property is surrounded by well-maintained greenery. Numerous free parking spaces are located right next to the building, ensuring easy parking. A major advantage of the property is its location. The building is located on a quiet street surrounded by greenery, yet close enough to public transportation to quickly reach distant parts of Warsaw. The "BrÃ³dno Podgrodzie" bus terminus is just 300 meters away, providing public transportation to various parts of Warsaw. Nearby is the M2 metro station - Metro Kondratowicza stop , allowing for traffic-free travel. Excellent access to the S8 expressway. A local grocery store is located at the entrance to the staircase. The development also features a parcel locker, a pharmacy, numerous shops and supermarkets, schools and kindergartens, service points, cafes and restaurants, and banks. The TargÃ³wek Shopping Center on ul. is approximately a 10-minute walk away. The Property The tenement house, built in 1904 in an eclectic style with elements of Art Nouveau, has been on the register of historical monuments since 2016. The building has undergone extensive refurbishment: the staircase was renovated in 2016, and the facade was renovated in 2020 (insulated, windows replace. The tenement house comprises 22 residential units. Apartment condition: the apartment had a major overhaul in 2005: floors were sanded and varnished, interior doors were replaced with new exotic wood doors, and the kitchen built-in furniture was replaced with new, wooden units. The balconies were refreshed in 2025. Layout kitchen living room 2 bedrooms bathroom separate WC hallway balcony Key Advantages history and character: an apartment in a tenement house with an extraordinary history. It was built in 1904 in an eclectic style with Art Nouveau elements. It survived the wartime destruction and the Warsaw Uprising. ENGLISH: For Sale: 4-Room Apartment, 98.1 m?, Located on the 3rd Floor of an 8-Story Apartment Building from 2015, at 13B Rydygiera Street in Å»oliborz. THE APARTMENT: The apartment was finished in 2016 to the highest standard. The interior was carefully designed by an architect to maximize the use of space. It's a perfect option for wood lovers ? the apartment features custom-made built-in furniture crafted by a carpenter, durable scorched ash wood flooring, and even the loggia (9.55 m?) is entirely lined with pine boards. The windows face three directions, and the ceiling height is 2.78 m. The living room, kitchen, and dining area form one beautifully lit open space of approximately 35m2, with a southeast exposure. Notable features include a TV wall finished with stucco and eye-catching steel shelves, as well as a built-in wine fridge. The master bedroom (15,8m2) is connected to a walk-in closet and a spacious bathroom (over 7m2) equipped with both a bathtub and a shower. There are also two cozy bedrooms, measuring 13,4m2 and 9,2m2. The hallway (7,2m2), which includes a large closet and a built-in bench, leads to a second bathroom (3m2) with a shower, sink, toilet, and towel radiator. THE AREA: The building at 13B Rydygiera Street is part of a prestigious residential complex, ideally located in terms of access to public transport and a wide range of shops and services. The area is full of amenities, including grocery stores, restaurants, preschools, a kids' gym, and even a notary office right next to the building entrance. Westfield Arkadia shopping center is also nearby. Getting to the city center by public transport takes just a few minutes. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: The apartment comes with 2 tandem parking spaces and a nearly 5m2 storage unit on the same floor, available for an additional cost of PLN 150,000 in total. About the Tenement House The tenement house at Wilcza 35/41 has a rich history. Although the current building dates back to the second half of the 20th century, representative tenement houses were already standing at this address in the 19th century. Since its construction in 1950, the tenement house has been part of the MarszaÅ‚kowska Residential District, which was listed in the register of monuments three times between 2015 and 2017. In 1955, a mosaic clock was made on the building's facade, which remains there to this day; we recommend viewing it from MarszaÅ‚kowska street.
